eventDecorators.name: EntryRemoved
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when an entry is removed.

parameterDecorators.name: sig
parameterDecorators.description: The signature of the method the entry is describing.

eventDecorators.name: EntryUpserted
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when an entry is inserted or updated.

parameterDecorators.name: sig
parameterDecorators.description: The signature of the method the entry is describing.

parameterDecorators.name: submitter
parameterDecorators.description: The address that upserted the entry.

parameterDecorators.name: cid
parameterDecorators.description: The IPFS CID of the file containing the Radspec description.

functionDecorators.name: getEntry
functionDecorators.description: Get an entry from the registry.

parameterDecorators.name: _sig
parameterDecorators.description: The signature of the method the entry is describing.

parameterDecorators.name: _scopes
parameterDecorators.description: The list of contract's bytecode hash.

functionDecorators.name: removeEntry
functionDecorators.description: Remove an entry from the registry.

parameterDecorators.name: _sig
parameterDecorators.description: The signature of the method the entry is describing.

parameterDecorators.name: _scopes
parameterDecorators.description: The list of contract's bytecode hash.

parameterDecorators.name: _cids
parameterDecorators.description: The list of IPFS CIDs of the file containing the description.

parameterDecorators.name: _sig
parameterDecorators.description: The signature of the method the entry is describing.

parameterDecorators.name: _cid
parameterDecorators.description: The IPFS CID of the file containing the description.
